title: Businessweek Talks with Erik Nordstrom
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks with Erik Nordstrom
description:
Nordstrom Co-President Erik Nordstrom discusses opening a flagship store in Manhattan as well as the health of the consumer. He speaks with Bloomberg Businessweek anchor Carol Massar.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
